# Custom School Capacity
Easily customize the capacity of school buildings at every level: elementary, high school, college, and university.
Mod Options - Custom Capacity from 10% - 500% (10% for a hard challenge!, 500% for massive cities/easy mode!) - Select from - Reset to vanilla game defaults brings all sliders back to 100%
Option customize the values yourself in the settings.
## Language Support English, French, Spanish, Simplified Chinese
